name: Toast Message
author: Karthik Viswanathan
description: A small popup message, generally triggered by an event, that disappears after a few seconds.

attributes.data-duration: Sets the visibility duration of the toast.
attributes.data-location: Sets the location (top or bottom) of the toast.
attributes.data-exclude-close: Sets whether the close button is excluded.

events.show: Triggered when the toast is shown.
events.hide: Triggered when the toast is hidden.

methods.show: Makes this toast appear for the interval specified by the data-duration attribute or duration property.
methods.hide: Makes this toast disappear if it is not hidden already.

getters.duration: Gets the visibility duration of the toast.
getters.location: Gets the location (top or bottom) of the toast.
getters.excludeClose: Gets whether the close button is excluded.

setters.duration: Sets the visibility duration of the toast in the data-duration attribute.
setters.location: Sets the location (top or bottom) of the toast in the data-location attribute.
setters.excludeClose: Sets whether the close button is excluded in the data-exclude-close attribute.
